attributes.additional_details: The reason why is many students (and workers) face much stress, hardships and difficulties trying to manage school and work, this will overall give students and workers more free time or time to do unfinished work/studies. This will improve the work rate and wilfulness for students and workers to come into school/work on Mondays.
attributes.background: We want you to make Friday a weekend for all students and all working people.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the petition we already have open on this topic:

To make Friday one less day of school, to allow kids to reset for monday.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630596
